item.title: By: iPod Dude
item.dc:creator: iPod Dude
item.description: Well, it makes sense since they are selling more iPods than anything else these days.
item.content:encoded: Well, it makes sense since they are selling more iPods than anything else these days.

item.title: By: Gary LaPointe
item.dc:creator: Gary LaPointe
item.description: They've talked about some mini-stores to focus on the iPod. Like at airports and such, but I'm not sure what every happened, maybe they actually opened some...
item.content:encoded: They’ve talked about some mini-stores to focus on the iPod. Like at airports and such, but I’m not sure what every happened, maybe they actually opened some…
